name: CommandConfigurator
descriptions: Adds support for command configuration, which allows you to change the name, aliases, permissions and disable the command

name: Configuration Backup
descriptions: Backs up the full configuration to prevent config destruction, backup is only 3 days back

name: Database
descriptions: Adds support for MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite and H2 databases

name: Afk
descriptions: It allows you to mark yourself as AFK, or if you are AFK, eternalcore will mark you as AFK after some time

name: ChatManager
descriptions: It allows you to manage chat, with slowmode, chat clear, chat on/off etc.

name: Warp System
descriptions: Allows you to create warps, optionally you can enable warp inventory

name: Language Inventory
descriptions: This feature allows you to create a language selector inventory

name: Sound after message in chat
descriptions: It allows you to play sound after message in chat

name: CommandBlocker
descriptions: It allows you to block commands with custom message

name: Player Death Message
descriptions: Send a message to all players when a player dies

name: Player Join Sound
descriptions: Play a sound after a player joins the server

name: Player Join Message
descriptions: Send a random welcome message from config to a player when they join the server

name: Bypass Full Server
descriptions: This feature allows you to bypass the full server, example for vip rank.

name: Player Quit Sound
descriptions: Play a sound after a player quits the server

name: Player Quit Message
descriptions: Send a random goodbye message from config to a player when they quit the server

name: Colored sign
descriptions: Allows you to use color codes in signs

name: Translations
descriptions: EternalCore can use multiple languages at once, the player can determine which EternalCore language I want to use, or you can determine from above what language all players want to use
